Miscellaneous Highlights: India whitewashed New Zealand in the ODIs, attention turns to the Twenty20 format as India host three T20Is against the Black Caps in five days.
Others: 1st T20I: Friday, January 27 at JSCA International Stadium Complex, Ranchi - 7.00pm local time (1.30pm GMT)
2nd T20I: Sunday, January 29 at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow - 7.00pm local time (1.30pm GMT)
3rd T20I: Wednesday, Februay 1 at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad - 7.00pm local time (1.30pm GMT)
